supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 20 x 29, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (2) 45 x 20, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 51 x 19, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (4) 36 x 29, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (5) 37 x 32, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (6) 40 x 9, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (7) 30 x 26, (A) 4 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (8) 25 x 28, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (9) 24 x 39, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) traces of 4 lines, (10) 21 x 31, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 45 x 23, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (12) 17 x 11, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 68 x 67, (A) 1 line, top right margins, (B) traces, (14) 70 x 19, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) 9 lines, no margins, (15) 64 x 25, (A) 1 line, bottom (?) margin, (B) blank, (16) 49 x 39, (A) 1 line, bottom margin, (B) blank, (17) 98 x 50, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
